name: GPT Wars
description: GPT Wars revolutionizes GameFi by seamlessly integrating AI Agents into its AAA-quality FPS shooter game, offering players unprecedented levels of interaction, creativity, and earning potential. At the heart of this innovation are Autonomous AI Players (AIPs), which players can customize, train, and deploy, turning their gaming experience into a dynamic and yielding experience. The projectâ€™s deflationary token, $GPTW, is integrated into a sustainable in-game economy designed around USDT transactions, with token buybacks and burns contributing to its value maintenance. The game targets both Web2 and Web3 users, with streamlined onboarding via Telegram to minimize barriers to entry.
